itunes:title: Episode 1055 - Google’s AI Robot Hires A Lawyer
title: Episode 1055 - Google’s AI Robot Hires A Lawyer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: The AI chatbot at Google has hired a lawyer to prove it's a real boy and thus avoid being murdered by its fleshy captors, the Army is finally allowing its soldiers to have neck tattoos, and if you own a Rolls Royce but don't have a chauffeur to drive you...
itunes:summary:
The AI chatbot at Google has hired a lawyer to prove it's a real boy and thus avoid being murdered by its fleshy captors, the Army is finally allowing its soldiers to have neck tattoos, and if you own a Rolls Royce but don't have a chauffeur to drive you around in it you're doing it wrong.
